name: Oceanalysis Ltd
goal: Oceanalysis Ltd, the independent consultancy company owned and operated by Dr Gus Jeans, is an established intermediate user of meteorological and oceanographic data products and services.  Consultancy activities include development and delivery of innovative solutions for end users in the offshore energy industry, including oil, gas and renewables.  This has also involves steering Research and Development  towards tangible applications.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: EMODnet, European Commission Directorate-General for Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (DG MARE) Marine Knowledge 2020 strategy, Copernicus, Horizon 2020 and all other initiatives related to ocean science.
